sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Create business calendar group m2m records during upgrade</description> <name>Create business calendar group m2m rows</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var fiscalType = gs.getProperty('com.glide.fiscal_calendar.fiscal_calendar_type');
if(fiscalType!='Regular' && fiscalType!='13 Period') fiscalType='445period';
var gr=new GlideAggregate('fiscal_period'); gr.setGroup(false); gr.setLimit(1); gr.query();
if(gr.hasNext()) new ITFM_FiscalCalendarGroup().populateBusinessCalendarGroups(fiscalType);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-09-21 16:55:53</sys_created_on> <sys_id>19992ecf539310105943ddeeff7b12bf</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Create business calendar group m2m rows</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Fiscal Calendar" source="com.snc.fiscal_calendar">0a10166b47e64210cd4e1ce4316d4327</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_19992ecf539310105943ddeeff7b12bf</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-09-21 17:31:02</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Create business calendar group m2m rows
